about_the_game:
Friends' Kitchen

Friends' Kitchen is a collaborative cooking and serving game designed for one to four players. As a team, you and your friends must prepare, cook, and serve various delicious orders before the shouting customers storm out in anger.

For now, you're on your own, but in the final version, you'll be ready to embark on your flavor journey with your friends. In Friends' Kitchen, your main goal will be to prepare mouthwatering dishes and serve them to your customers as a chef, waiter, or manager.

You'll embark on an enjoyable journey with different kitchens, diverse foods, and various career development options. Play alone in both cooperative and competitive challenge modes, or join forces with up to four players to work together. To become the most effective and best team, you'll need to cook various dishes and collaborate effectively!

SIMPLE CONTROLS/DEEP CHALLENGES

Playing Friends' Kitchen is so easy that anyone can join the fun. All you need is a team that can interact with the necessary areas (countertop, cupboard, etc.) and coordinate their actions.

DIFFERENT WAYS TO PLAY


If you love the kitchen and think you make the best dishes, you can play as a CHEF.

If you have strong communication skills, can establish good relationships with people, and can run fast, you can play as a WAITER.

If you have enough money and knowledge, you can play as a MANAGER.

Whether you prefer single-player or local multiplayer, or if your friends are in different cities/countries, you can play the game with online multiplayer modes.
